text: Ti, yaki zalyshylysya na svoyikh mistsyakh, radily, shcho vony v tylu Poslantsya Allaha. Yim bulo nenavysno borotysya na shlyakhu Allaha, zhertvuyuchy svoye mayno ta dushi. Vony hovoryly: «Ne vyrushayte v pokhid u taku speku!» Skazhy: «Vohonʹ heyeny bude shche haryachishym!» Ta yakby vony rozumily
